scripts.build:mac: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && zip -r dist/myttv-v$VERSION.zip . -x 'node_modules/*' -x '.git/*' -x 'dist/*' -x '*.DS_Store'
scripts.build:win: rmdir /s /q dist && mkdir dist && powershell -NoProfile -Command "$v=(Get-Content package.json | ConvertFrom-Json).version; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path dist\tempzip | Out-Null; robocopy . dist\tempzip /E /XD node_modules dist .git /XF .DS_Store > $null; Set-Location dist; Compress-Archive -Path tempzip\* -DestinationPath ('myttv-v' + $v + '.zip') -Force; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force tempzip"
